CONTROLS

Desktop Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move spaceship

Spacebar: Shoot

P: Pause game

ESC: Open menu

Mobile Controls

Touch & Drag: Move spaceship

Auto-fire: Weapons fire automatically

Tap Menu: Access pause and upgrades

Gameplay Tips

• Collect power-ups for temporary boosts

• Upgrade your ship between waves

• Shield regenerates when not taking damage

• Higher waves give more coins and score
